title: The Planets of Star Wars
description: This React 19.0.0/Next.js 15.0.3 (+TypeScript & Sass) application utilizes SWR to fetch planet data from SWAPI (Star Wars API). The api response is then utilized to render a home page and a detail page (for a selected planet). Additionally, I wrote unit tests for both the detail and home pages with Jest and react-router-dom.

title: Employee App
description: This Angular 18 application requests an array of employees from a json file, then populates a table with employee information. The table can be filtered by name and sorted by name and id. Clicking an employee's name routes to a detail view for the selected employee.

title: Contact Book
description: This Angular 18 application requests an array of contacts from a serverless function built with Netlify edge functions & express.js. Once the Angular service receives a response, the response is referenced to populate the panel with all contacts, then the profile with the applied contact.
